4000335.name: Kiyo's Beek

4000339.name: Jonin Throwing Star

4000346.name: Emperor Toad Wallet

4000361.name: May Mist

4000382.name: Blue Essence

4000383.name: Red Essence

4000510.desc: The Bluejay Feather that the Wise One from the Miwok tribe used to predict the future. Kopee Relicseeker says she can make the legendary ring using the feather.

4000511.desc: The Red Bird Feather that the Wise One from the Miwok tribe used to predict the future. Kopee Relicseeker says she can make the legendary ring using the feather.

4000513.desc: The buffalo horn with which the Brave One from the Miwok tribe equipped himself in battles. Kopee Relicseeker says she can make the legendary ring using the horn.

4000514.desc: The puma bone with which the Brave One from the Miwok tribe equipped himself in battles. Kopee Relicseeker says she can make the legendary ring using the puma bones.

4000520.name: Haunted Mansion Brass Key
4000520.desc: A key that looks like it can unlock the doors inside the Haunted Mansion.

4000523.desc: Cat saliva that has been cursed with Black Magic. Also, it is used as an ingredient in Witch Malady's cooking.

4000524.desc: Looks like a type of currency used in a world other than Maple World.

4000527.name: Male Mannequin's Fedora
4000527.desc: A black fedora that the Male Mannequin was wearing.

4000532.name: Yellow Perfume

4000534.name: Pink Perfume
4000534.desc: A rose-scented perfume. Light and airy.

4000537.name: Fancy Amplifier Cables
4000537.desc: Fancy cables that connect to fancy amplifiers.

4000538.name: Spirit of Rock's Music Score
4000538.desc: A music score that Spirit of Rock treasures.

4000539.name: Cherry Bubble

4000540.name: Melon Bubble
4000540.desc: Sweet melon-flavored bubble from a melon bubble tea.

4000541.name: Mango Bubble
4000541.desc: Sweet mango-flavored bubble from a mango bubble tea.

4000543.name: Jr. Pepe Keychain
4000543.desc: A cute keychain with a dangling Jr. Pepe doll.

4000544.name: Orange Mushroom Doll
4000544.desc: A pretty Orange Mushroom doll from the claw vending machine.

4000545.name: Red Squishy Liquid

4000546.name: Silver Squishy Liquid
4000546.desc: Jelly from a Silver Slime. It looks pretty heavy.

4000547.name: Gold Squishy Liquid
4000547.desc: Jelly from a Gold Slime. It looks expensive.

4000548.name: Overlord A Radar Device
4000548.desc: A radar that detects anything within a 10m radius.

4000549.name: Overlord B Radar Device
4000549.desc: A radar that detects anything within a 30m radius.

4000550.name: Robby's Electronic Induction Device
4000550.desc: A device that communicates using the nearest inductive material.

4000551.name: Iruvata Laser Sword

4000552.name: Afterlord Chained Tire
4000552.desc: Appears durable enough to maneuver through the wilderness.

4000553.desc: This propulsion system uses nitrogen energy as its propellant.

4000554.name: Maverick Type A Component
4000554.desc: A component of Maverick Type A that is abrasion-resistant due to its ergonomic design.

4000555.name: Maverick Type S Laser Gun

4000557.name: Imperial Guard Vacuum Tube
4000557.desc: A vacuum tube that uses air pressure to maintain an output of at least 5 tons.

4000558.name: Royal Guard Armor

4000628.name: Vulture's Shoulder Accessory
4000628.desc: A shoulder piece from the Grey Vulture.

4000629.name: Castle Golem Brick

4000630.name: Purification Totem
4000630.desc: A small totem engraved with a picture of a lion, with the power to break the Lion King's curse. To purify the corruption of the castle, many are needed.

4000673.name: Grassy Mud Clump

4000674.name: Chao's Tusk

4000676.name: Shining Fairy's Wings
4000676.desc: These wings have a bright green glow.

4001000.name: Arwen's Glass Shoes
4001000.desc: A shiny glass shoes for women-only.

4001002.name: The Girl Next Door
4001002.desc: A book with a dangerous content.

4001003.name: Old Gold Watch
4001003.desc: An old gold watch. An article left by Alex's late mother.

4001004.name: "Blackbull's" deed to the land
4001004.desc: A lost deed to the land for "Blackbull" of Perion.

4001005.name: Ancient Scroll
4001005.desc: A scroll from long ago that contains powerful, mysterious magic from then.

4001006.name: Flaming Feather
4001006.desc: A flame with the look of a feather. It never stops burning.

4001007.name: Coupon
4001007.desc: A coupon earned by taking down a monster. Can be traded with a pass.

4001008.desc: A pass earned by trading with a coupon. Can only advance to the next stage with a pass.

4001015.name: Paper Document
4001015.desc: A document that contains informations about the studies on return scrolls. Collect these to exchange with return scroll to Mines.

4001016.name: The Key
4001016.desc: An important key that'll allow access to the huge tresure chest at the Mine Quest.

4001017.name: Eye of Fire

4001019.name: Orbis Rock Scroll
4001019.desc: Use it at the magic rock on either the 1st or the 20th floor of Orbis Tower to teleport to one another.

4001020.name: Eos Rock Scroll
4001020.desc: You can transport to the other Eos Rocks by activating them using this scroll

4001022.name: Pass of Dimension

4001023.name: Key of Dimension
4001023.desc: A key possessed by Alishar. It can be used to block the entrances that leads to other places.

4001024.name: Rubian
4001024.desc: A breathtakingly beautiful red jewel. Need to be careful not to be too enamored with its color, though.

4001025.name: Longinus Spear
4001025.desc: A spear of mythical force. It contains elements that disables the seal of Eregoth.

4001026.name: Key
4001026.desc: A key made out of pure gold that is used to open a locked door.

4001027.name: Medal of Valor

4001028.name: Scroll of Wisdom

4001029.name: Spoiled Food

4001103.name: Cornian's Marrow

4001108.desc: A small flame that'll slowly build up to be a cold fire.

4001110.name: [Storybook] Unknown Letter
4001110.desc: It's an anonymous letter. It just said 'I have what you want. Meet me at the Cloud Balcony'#.\nOnly for : #cNight Lord

4001111.name: [Storybook] Crimson Balrog's Proposal
4001111.desc: It's half of the note about the plan to kidnap Tylus that Crimson Balrog had.\nOnly for : 4th job Warrior

4001112.name: [Storybook] Indecipherable Book
4001112.desc: It's a book written with monster language that I can't read. Would Manji know about the book?\nOnly for : 4th Job Warrior

4001113.name: Phoenix's Egg
4001113.desc: An egg of a legendary bird Phoenix.

4001114.name: Freezer's Egg
4001114.desc: An egg of a legendary bird Freezer.

4001115.name: Undine's Cloth
4001115.desc: An arcane piece of cloth from Undine, the powerful water spirit. Something may happen if this is combined with the Monster Eraser...

4001116.name: Hectagon Necklace
4001116.desc: A beautiful piece of necklace featuring the hexagon-shaped jewelry. Something may happen if brought with the Monster Eraser...

4001117.name: Old Metal Key

4001118.name: Piece of the Pirate Map

4001119.name: Pirate Map
4001119.desc: It's the map that details the routes that the pirates take.

4001120.desc: A mark that signifies that the owner is in the lower ranks among the pirates.

4001121.desc: A mark that signifies that the owner is in the middle ranks among the pirates.

4001122.name: Mark of the Veteran Pirate
4001122.desc: A mark that signifies that the owner is in the top ranks among the pirates.

4001123.name: Transparent Item
4001123.desc: A transparent item for summoning Wu Yang.

4001124.name: Dr. Do's Marble
4001124.desc: It's the marble I received after giving medicinal ingredients to Dr. Do.

4001125.name: Bloctopus Blueprint
4001125.desc: A blueprint that contains information on constructing a Bloctoplus.

4001127.name: Fuse
4001127.desc: This is used to make firecrackers.

4001128.name: Powder keg
4001128.desc: This is used to make firecrackers.

4001129.name: Maple Coin
4001129.desc: A maple mark is engrained on this shiny coin.  Exchangeable for an item via Spiegelmann.

4001130.name: Romeo's Letter
4001130.desc: A letter that Romeo wrote to Juliet, warning of a suspicious plan that is to occur.

4001131.name: Juliet's Letter
4001131.desc: A letter that Juliet wrote to Romeo, warning of a suspicious plan that is to occur.

4001132.name: Suspicious Liquid
4001132.desc: A bottle that contains a green liquid that has been treated with a peculiar chemical.

4001133.name: Card Key

4001134.name: Alcadno's Experiment Files
4001134.desc: Research information on Alcadno's stolen ingredient.

4001135.name: Zenumist's Experiment Files
4001135.desc: Research information on Zenumist's stolen ingredient.

4001136.desc: A piece of a scroll.  I should collect the pieces and take it to Cassandra before September 19th, 2008.

4001141.name: Snowman Branch
4001141.desc: A tree branch used to make a Kid Snowman arm. Represents a pure innocense of the kids that made the Snowman.

4001156.name: Pass of Dimension
4001156.desc: A pass earned by defeating a monster. This pass is required in order to enter the next stage.

4001157.name: Star Stamp
4001157.desc: A star stamp earned by protecting the candle given by the Administrator.

4001158.name: Feather of Goddess
4001158.desc: A feather from Minerva the Goddess.

4001159.name: Zenumist Marble
4001159.desc: A marble taken care of by Romeo.

4001160.name: Alcadno Marble
4001160.desc: A marble taken care of by Juliet.

4001161.name: Concentrated Poison
4001161.desc: This poison is too strong for anyone to handle.

4001162.name: Diluted Poison
4001162.desc: This poison has been diluted with water. It can now be handled.

4001163.name: Purple Stone of Magic
4001163.desc: It's a magic stone that's purple.\nIt can probably trigger a reaction from something...

4001164.name: Golem's Marble
4001164.desc: It's the essence of Poison Golem. It will have to be cleansed in clear spring water.

4001165.name: Sunshine
4001165.desc: Maple Tree loves this sunshine. Give it an ample amount of sunshine, and the tree will grow.

4001166.name: Snow Silk
4001166.desc: A ball of silk that's cold like snow, as if it'll melt away.

4001167.desc: A piece of the MapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary cake.  You can complete the cake by opening the cake box and placing 4 cake pieces on the plate.

4001168.name: Golden Maple Leaf
4001168.desc: A Golden Maple Leaf that fell from a Maple Tree specially for MapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary.  Take it to the keeper of the maple tree and receive a special present.

4001169.name: Monster Marble
4001169.desc: This marble contains a poisoned monster. The monster is being purified within it

4001174.name: Practice Shoes
4001174.desc: The most basic form of shoes for practice.

4001175.name: Kid Shoes
4001175.desc: Adorable cute shoes that are obviously only for dids.

4001176.name: Shovel
4001176.desc: A small shovel with a short handle for easier shoveling.

4001178.name: Beach Sandals
4001178.desc: A pair of sandals perfect for walking around the beach on a hot summer day.

4001179.name: Water Gun for Training
4001179.desc: It looks exactly like the Laser Gun, but it's a water gun, making it an optimal weapon for training.

4001180.name: Gloves for Outside
4001180.desc: A durable pair of gloves perfect for outside.

4001181.name: Mittens
4001181.desc: A warm, red furry pair of mittens.

4001182.name: Clean Mop
4001182.desc: A clean mop that hasn't been used yet.

4001183.name: Training Uniform
4001183.desc: A white training uniform featuring a red belt. The uniform lets in air and is very light, so the students won't pass out training under the sun.

4001184.name: Durable Rake
4001184.desc: A metal rake used to rake the farm.

4001185.name: Warm Fur Boots
4001185.desc: A pair of warm fur boots that goes up to the ankle.

4001186.name: King's Turban
4001186.desc: A special turban ordered by Abdullah VIII. Very fancy, to say the least.

4001187.name: Beltin
4001187.desc: A mysterious fish that allows one to sing well and in tune after eating it.

4001188.name: Breakin
4001188.desc: A mysterious fish that allows one to rock the dance floor after eating it.

4001189.name: Poppin
4001189.desc: A mysterious fish that allows one to sing well and in rhythm after eaten it.

4001190.name: Blackhole Marble
4001190.desc: Inside a clear marble, there is a black hole like figure swirling around.

4001191.name: Excellent Agent Badge
4001191.desc: A badge that is given to an agent who accomplishes their mission with excellence.

4001192.name: Intelligence Document
4001192.desc: Intelligence document that contains investigations regarding Master M and party quest monsters.

4001193.name: Transparent Item for Lightning
4001193.desc: A transparent item for lightning expressions.

4001198.name: Altaire Fragment
4001198.desc: This is given to those who save Altaire Camp from Forest of Poison Haze.

4001199.name: Straw
4001199.desc: A warm set of straws used to make a bird's nest. Gather them all up, and bring them together and show them to Gaga.

4001201.name: Funny Travel Stories
4001201.desc: A tape that contained all the fun adventure stories recorded while on the road.

4001202.name: Top 10 Pop Star Hits
4001202.desc: A tape that only contained the lastest from radio and tv.

4001203.name: Manji's Ragged Diary
4001203.desc: An old, ragged diary that includes the war stories of Manji in Perion. Let's return it to the Maple Admin.

4001204.name: Gwin's Travel Stories
4001204.desc: A collection of travel storries that Gwin wrote. Need to hand it back to the Maple Admin.

4001205.name: Ericsson's Travel Stories
4001205.desc: A handwritten, gripping account of Ericsson's days as an explorer.

4001207.name: Black Scale
4001207.desc: A scale that's slightly dyed in black. Something doesn't seem right with this.

4001214.name: Richie Gold - Golden Key
4001214.desc: A key that leads to Richie Gold's treasure storage. Entering this storage alone requires 3 keys. \n#cRelated Quest:Richie Gold's Maze

4001215.name: Whatever Charm
4001215.desc: A charm that lets one skip a mission.

4001231.name: Candy Cane
4001231.desc: A Chrismas Candy Cane for Jump Event

4001232.name: White Gift Box
4001232.desc: A white gift box that can be found inside the New Year's Lucky Pouch. Bring it to the Game Administrator to receive a gift from the box.

4001233.name: Red Gift Box
4001233.desc: A red gift box that can be found inside the New Year's Lucky Pouch. Bring it to the Game Administrator to receive a gift from the box.

4001234.name: Blue Gift Box
4001234.desc: A blue gift box that can be found inside the New Year's Lucky Pouch. Bring it to the Game Administrator to receive a gift from the box.

4001235.name: Purple Gift Box
4001235.desc: A purple gift box that can be found inside the New Year's Lucky Pouch. Bring it to the Game Administrator to receive a gift from the box.

4001237.name: Slightly Polluted Rock
4001237.desc: This rock has a slight hint of that unmistakable force of darkness.

4001238.name: Polluted Rock
4001238.desc: This rock really has the force of Black Mage stored in it.

4001239.name: Heavily Polluted Rock
4001239.desc: This rock contains a powerful force of Black Mage stored in it.

4001240.name: Polluted Item
4001240.desc: A piece of rock that has been irreparable damaged because of the force of the Black Mage.

4001245.name: Pigmy's Golden Egg
4001245.desc: Pigmy's Golden Egg. It can only be hatched by a fairy from a fairytale.

4001246.name: Warm Sunlight
4001246.desc: Drop the Warm Sunlight in front of the Bean Stalk to make it grow.

4001247.name: Story Treasure Box
4001247.desc: A Treasure Box hidden in the Dungeon.

4001249.name: Maple Necklace Gem
4001249.desc: A beautiful gem that can be set on the Mind of Maple Necklace.

4001250.name: Maple Necklace Pendant
4001250.desc: This can be used to create the Mind of Maple Necklace.

4001254.name: Shiny Maple Coin
4001254.desc: An octagonal gold coin with a maple mark. The Shiny Maple Coins can be traded for items from Spiegelmann.

4001255.name: Golden Pig's Hard Egg
4001255.desc: It's too hard to open. It may be a good idea to bring it to Goldrich.

4001256.name: Primal Claw
4001256.desc: A symbolic weapon of Thief mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001257.name: Staff of First Magic
4001257.desc: A symbolic weapon of Mage mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001258.name: Ancestral Bow
4001258.desc: A symbolic weapon of Bowman mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001259.name: Master Sword
4001259.desc: A symbolic weapon of Warrior mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001260.name: Forbidden Gun
4001260.desc: A symbolic weapon of Pirate mastery.  Although it can't be equipped, its power is palpable.  This item must be placed in the Altar of Mastery to activate it.

4001261.name: Piece of Balrog Leather
4001261.desc: A piece of leather from a Balrog's rough hide.

4001264.name: Shepherd Boy's Lunch.
4001264.desc: This is a Shepherd Boy's Lunch. Collect and deliver them to the Lamb. You can get a reward when you win.

4001268.name: Brown Krypto Crystal
4001268.desc: A Brown Krypto Crystal containing the mysterious energies of space.

4001269.name: Emerald Krypto Crystal
4001269.desc: An Emerald Krypto Crystal containing the mysterious energies of space.

4001270.name: Warm-hearted Child's Note
4001270.desc: An item that is falsely rumored to be only visible to warm-hearted children. Take it to Cassandra.

4001272.name: Giant Nependeath Seed
4001272.desc: A seed from a Giant Nependeath. It's very big.

4001300.name: Granada
4001300.desc: A captivating single rose loved by the Witch.

4001301.desc: A permit that allows one to dig up relics. Talk to Gaga to receive another permit.

4001302.name: Valuable Artifact
4001302.desc: A relic that looks very rare.

4001303.name: Petrified Mouse
4001303.desc: The first of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001304.name: Gaga's Glasses
4001304.desc: The second of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001305.name: Cassandra's Crystal Ball
4001305.desc: The third of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001306.name: The Shiny Watch
4001306.desc: The fourth of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001307.name: A Soccer Cleat
4001307.desc: The fifth of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001308.name: The Quest Completion Book
4001308.desc: The sixth of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001309.name: A Pretty Hair-Tie
4001309.desc: The seventh of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001310.name: An Old Shoe
4001310.desc: The last of 8 treasures mentioned by Shuang.

4001311.name: Ancient Relic
4001311.desc: A relic that appears to be very old.

4001316.name: Cassandra's Album

4001317.name: Helmet Pepe's Helmet
4001317.desc: A helmet worn by Helmet Pepe. Put it on to disguise yourself as a Helmet Pepe.

4001318.name: The Royal Seal of the Mushking Empire
4001318.desc: The Royal Seal that represents the power of the Mushking Empire.

4001320.name: Flower Tube Coupon
4001320.desc: Take this to Cassandra, and exchange it for a pretty Pink Flower Tube.

4001321.name: Train 999 Boarding Pass
4001321.desc: Allows one to board Train 999 through Mr. Lim.

4001322.name: Pharaoh Yeti's Sapphire
4001322.desc: A sapphire mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

4001323.name: Pharaoh Yeti's Ruby

4001324.name: Pharaoh Yeti's Emerald
4001324.desc: An emerald mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

4001325.name: Pharaoh Yeti's Topaz
4001325.desc: A topaz mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

4001326.name: Red Crayon
4001326.desc: A red crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001327.name: Orange Crayon
4001327.desc: An orange crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001328.name: Yellow Crayon
4001328.desc: A yellow crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001329.name: Green Crayon
4001329.desc: A green crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001330.name: Blue Crayon
4001330.desc: A blue crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001331.name: Indigo Crayon
4001331.desc: An Indigo crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001332.name: Violet Crayon
4001332.desc: A violet crayon. Use it to color in the picture of the rainbow.

4001333.name: Pot

4001334.name: Yellow Flower Pot
4001334.desc: A small pot that contains a yellow flower. Take it to Gaga to trade it for a crayon.

4001339.name: Treacherous Fox Tail

4001340.name: Foreign Object
4001340.desc: A green-colored foreign object that was blocking the pipes. Looks very dirty.

4001341.name: Broken Iron Fragment
4001341.desc: Looks like a fragment that broke off of something...?

4001342.name: Pig Shaped Bottle
4001342.desc: Wine would taste great in this bottle.

4001345.name: Sunglasses
4001345.desc: Looks like it belongs to a rock star.

4001347.name: Ellinia Tree Barrel
4001347.desc: A tree stump from Ellinia with a brown tint.

4001348.name: Memory Fragment
4001348.desc: Contains the memory of Solomon's bow.

4001349.name: Octopus Leg Stick
4001349.desc: An Octopus Leg that has been dried to resemble a stick.

4001350.name: Pumpkin Head
4001350.desc: Wearing this item compels you to listen to some Rock'n Roll.

4001365.name: Octopus Sample

4001366.desc: There appears to be strange markings drawn on it.

4001368.name: Ripped Paper-2

4001369.name: Ripped Paper-3

4001370.desc: Clue found near the Dark Portal where Crocell is located.

4001371.name: Ripped Paper-5

4001446.name: 7th Anniversary Puzzle Piece G

4001512.desc: This coupon allows you get points doubled during the Ancient Artifact Contest.

4001528.name: Prison Key

4002000.name: Snail Stamp
4002000.desc: A stamp with a snail drawn in.

4002002.name: Stump Stamp
4002002.desc: A stamp with a stump drawn in.

4002003.name: Slime Stamp
4002003.desc: A stamp with a slime drawn in.

4003000.name: Screw
4003000.desc: A small screw made out of steel. Used as a material to make weapons or armors.

4003001.name: Processed Wood
4003001.desc: A processed wood made out of tree branches. Used as a material to make weapons or armors.

4003002.name: Piece of Ice
4003002.desc: Water frozen through the power of magic. Doesn't melt easily.

4003003.name: Fairy Wing
4003003.desc: A piece of wing from a fairy. It's soft and brittle, so it should be handled with care.

4003004.name: Stiff Feather
4003004.desc: A feather that's stiff and rough. Used to make arrows.

4003005.name: Soft Feather
4003005.desc: A soft and light feather. Used to make arrows.

4004000.name: Power Crystal Ore

4004001.name: Wisdom Crystal Ore
4004001.desc: An ore of a crystal that possesses wisdom.

4004002.name: DEX Crystal Ore
4004002.desc: An ore of a crystal that possesses dexterity.

4004003.name: LUK Crystal Ore
4004003.desc: An ore of a crystal that possesses luck.

4004004.name: Dark Crystal Ore
4004004.desc: An ore of a crystal that possesses dark power. An incredible power lay asleep in it.

4005000.name: Power Crystal
4005000.desc: A mysterious crystal with the source of power in it.

4005001.name: Wisdom Crystal
4005001.desc: A mysterious crystal with the source of wisdom in it.

4005002.name: DEX Crystal
4005002.desc: A mysterious crystal with the source of dexterity in it.

4005003.name: LUK Crystal
4005003.desc: A mysterious crystal with the source of luck in it.

4005004.name: Dark Crystal
4005004.desc: A mysterious crystal with the source of dark power in it. An incredible power lay asleep in it.

4006000.desc: A mythical rock with the power of magic in it. Used with high-leveled skills.

4006001.name: The Summoning Rock
4006001.desc: A mythical rock with the power of summoning in it. Used with high-leveled skills.

4007000.name: Magic Powder (Brown)

4007001.name: Magic Powder (White)

4007002.name: Magic Powder (Blue)
4007002.desc: A blue Magic Powder used to create armors.

4007003.name: Magic Powder (Green)
4007003.desc: A green Magic Powder used to create armors.

4007004.name: Magic Powder (Yellow)
4007004.desc: A yellow Magic Powder used to create armors.

4007005.name: Magic Powder (Purple)
4007005.desc: A purple Magic Powder used to create armors.

4007006.name: Magic Powder (Red)
4007006.desc: A red Magic Powder used to create armors.

4007007.name: Magic Powder (Black)
4007007.desc: A black Magic Powder used to create armors.

4009169.name: Frozen Rose Petal
4009169.desc: A rose petal frozen from centuries in the snow. Doesn't seem tasty, so you might as well sell it at the shop.

4009170.name: Loose Chain
4009170.desc: An old chain that clangs around in your inventory. All that noise is making you mad. You should sell it at the shop.

4009171.name: Dried Rose Vine
4009171.desc: A dried rose vine. It makes the Golems look a bit prettier.

4009172.desc: Shining powder obtained from a Golen Bee. Maybe the shops will buy this for a lot of money.
4009172.name: Shiny Flower Powder

4009800.desc: Ripped from the Green Mushroom. Do not seem safe to eat.
4009800.name: Proto Spores

4009801.desc: Noone quite knows what these crystals do. They grow on the back of Blue Wyverns.
4009801.name: Eternium Crystal

4009802.name: Dark Cornian Tail
4009802.desc: A tail cut off from a Dark Cornian. It's cold, scaly, and heavy.

4009803.name: Leeching Slug
4009803.desc: A blood-thirsty slug dropped by Glutton Ghoul. Don't put it on your skin.

4009804.name: Ancient Amber
4009804.desc: An amber stone with a bug trapped inside. It's probably ancient.

4009805.name: Typhon Egg
4009805.desc: An giant egg snatched from a Typhon nest.

4009806.name: Harvester Seed
4009806.desc: A seed which, when planted, grows into a sentient plant.

4009807.name: Razor Vine
4009807.desc: Incredibly toxic vines. Don't touch the thorns!

4009808.name: Slygie Meat
4009808.desc: A slab of meat from Slygie. It smells terrible.

4009809.name: Squid Tentacle
4009809.desc: A tentacle taken from Squid. It's wobbly and slimy.

4009810.name: Thanatos' Horn
4009810.desc: A horn taken from Thanatos' head. It emanates a dark energy.

4009811.name: Flyeye
4009811.desc: The eye of a Flyeye. Yuck!

4009812.name: Gold Plated Pearl
4009812.desc: A round pearl, with a thin coat of gold.

4009813.name: Rose of Death and Decay
4009813.desc: A magical rose representing death itself.

4009814.name: Heart of Nature
4009814.desc: A strangely shaped heart made of wood.

4009815.name: Tid Dandelion
4009815.desc: A flower containing trace amounts of the power of time.

4009816.name: Divine Clover
4009816.desc: A clover said to be collected by divine beings. Sometimes Birk eats this, unknowingly.

4009817.name: Mysterious Jar
4009817.desc: A very heavy jar with unknown contents. Whatever is inside, seems to be jelly-like.

4009818.desc: A giant, glistening leaf. When held, one can sense its strange aura.
4009818.name: Leaf of Instinct

4009819.desc: It's the gigantic jawbone taken from Skelegon. Gross.
4009819.name: Skelegon Jawbone

4009820.desc: A very rare dragon skull, which seems to contain a living soul, even when separated from its body.
4009820.name: Genesis Skull

4009821.desc: A glowing container which contains a forsaken soul. It is trapped forever, never being put to rest.
4009821.name: Forsaken Soul

4009822.desc: A sack containing a strange substance known as ectoplasm. Its properties are unknown.
4009822.name: Ectoplasm

4009823.desc: A special leash which traps the bearer in a state outside of the normal flow of time.
4009823.name: Temporal Leash

4009824.desc: It's the horn taken from a Birk. It's very heavy.
4009824.name: Birk Horn

4009826.desc: A broken off horn from the giant dragon, Brexton.
4009826.name: Brexton Horn

4009827.desc: A thick slab of scaly skin, cut from a Dragon Turtle.
4009827.name: Dragon Turtle Scales

4009828.desc: A gnarled tooth extracted from the mouth of Hobi.
4009828.name: Hobi Tooth

4009829.desc: One of the wooden horns growing on Rash.
4009829.name: Rash Twig

4009830.name: Snake Meat
4009830.desc: A rare flesh poached from the mighty Pythons of Thailand.

4009831.desc: A mysterious burning entity left behind by the Bains.
4009831.name: Essence of Rage

4009832.desc: A flammable purple oil used by Ninto.
4009832.name: Purple Lifeblood

4009833.desc: A shiny heirloom taken from a wealthy family in Lushan Town.
4009833.name: Stolen Locket

4009834.desc: A potent cologne mixed with poison. Used by Male Burglars to escape from defeat.
4009834.name: Cologne

4009835.desc: A translucent sphere that shimmers with a bright red hue.
4009835.name: Red Slime Bubble

4009836.desc: An overgrown remnant left behind by Mossy Mushrooms.
4009836.name: Dead Moss

4009837.desc: A sprout believed to hold ancient powers harnessed by the beings of Ellin Forest.
4009837.name: Flower Bud

4009838.desc: A mud clump gathered from the floor of Ellin Forest.
4009838.name: Mud Clump

4009839.desc: A preserved tail of a powerful and ancient boar that once roamed the lands of the Maple World.
4009839.name: Primitive Boar Tail

4009840.desc: A concoction of some sorts that has a beautiful fragrance.
4009840.name: Fairy Perfume

4009841.desc: A beautiful tulip picked from the forest floor.
4009841.name: Tulip

4009842.desc: This fur is surprisingly fluffy despite being exposed to such icy elements.
4009842.name: Beast Fur

4009843.desc: A bottle of cold water from the darkest depths of the ocean.
4009843.name: Bottle of Frigid Water

4009844.desc: A tough and durable skin of the elusive Goby found deep inside Aqua Road.
4009844.name: Fish Skin

4009845.desc: A beautiful pink flower that grows around Fantasy Theme Park.
4009845.name: Aster

4009846.desc: A seed with magical properties known to be the very essence of creating life within the outskirts of Ulu City.
4009846.name: Giant Seed

4009847.desc: A tree log that Beserkie has grown quite fond of.
4009847.name: Tree Log

4009848.desc: A sack filled to the brim with gold coins. Upon closer inspection, they seem to be of the chocolate variety.
4009848.name: Sack of 'Gold' Coins

4009849.desc: A vial full of black liquid. Nobody really knows what this is, or what it's made of.
4009849.name: Mysterious Black Liquid

4009850.desc: A marble carried around by Mr. Anchor. It is said to contain the soul of a lost sailor.
4009850.name: Soul Marble

4009851.desc: These sticks are bound by an entity reluctant to give them back. They contain materials coveted by the monks of Lushan Town and highly sought after.
4009851.name: Incense Sticks

4009852.desc: Useful study notes from an Extra D.
4009852.name: Study Notes

4009853.desc: A feather plucked from a Giant Eagle.
4009853.name: Eagle Tailfeather

4009854.desc: These bones are said to contain ancient magic, these very hands have mastered the skill of long forgotten techniques that used to be passed down for generations.
4009854.name: Elderwraith Hand

4009855.desc: A fang that's been ripped off a Nightshadow's mask. It denotes a glorious victory over an elite warrior of the Corrupt Army.
4009855.name: Nightshadow Fang

4009856.desc: The soul dust obtained from a Crimson Guardian. The very essence of these ancient defenders are contained within.
4009856.name: Red Soul Dust

4009857.desc: An ancient scroll carried by a Windraider. It's said to be as old as the wind itself.
4009857.name: Wind Scroll

4009858.desc: A flame wielded by a Firebrand.
4009858.name: Mystical Fire

4009859.desc: A tome holding secrets known only to the Stormcasters.
4009859.name: Ancient Tome

4009860.desc: A piece of cloth used to cover Jonin's face.
4009860.name: Dirty Cloth

4009861.desc: A honey-filled pot that's over 200 years old.
4009861.name: Ancient Honey

4009862.desc: A beautiful bunch of pretty blue flowers.
4009862.name: Harvestbells

4009863.desc: A leafy pouch Rexton keeps nearby to store herbs and medicine.
4009863.name: Leafy Pouch

4009864.desc: A bundle of grass gathered by Nest Golem.
4009864.name: Bundle of Grass

4009865.desc: A warm fire that fuels the Red Wyvern's rage.
4009865.name: Wyvern Flame

4009866.desc: This sand has been around for eons. As old as the stars in the sky.
4009866.name: Mysterious Sand

4009867.desc: A bunch of red grapes that grow around the outskirts of Leafre forest.
4009867.name: Red Grapes

4009868.desc: The corrupted soul of a Dark Wyvern. An evil energy can be felt when holding it.
4009868.name: Wyvern Soul

4009869.desc: A horn taken from the humanoid creatures of the Dragon Forest.
4009869.name: Cornian's Horn

4009870.desc: The crystallized essense of frost itself. It's said that the Blue Kentaurus draws its glacial power from here.
4009870.name: Frost Crystal

4009871.desc: A delicate handful of feathers gathered from a Harp. It smells like fresh rain.
4009871.name: Sacred Feathers

4009872.desc: A handful of redcurrants the Red kentaurus had gathered earlier.
4009872.name: Redcurrants

4009873.desc: Tangerines collected by Beetle. A tasty fruit native to Leafre.
4009873.name: Tangerines

4009874.desc: An angelic feather plucked from the tail of a Blood Harp. It's said to have tremendous healing powers.
4009874.name: Blood Tailfeather

4009875.desc: An exquisite looking fruit that grows on the outskirts of Leafre.
4009875.name: Golden Apple

4009876.desc: A little bug that hitched a ride on a Dark Rash.
4009876.name: Small Bug

4009877.desc: Dew collected in the early hours of the morning around Leafre by Hankie.
4009877.name: Morning Dew

4009878.desc: A residue that lingers behind after a Spiking Viking has been destroyed. It has a slightly grisly appearance.
4009878.name: Ghastly Residue

4009879.desc: A gemstone long lost to the sea many years ago.
4009879.name: Heart of the Ocean

4009880.desc: A liquid that has been lost in time. It looks like it contains some otherworldly properties that doesn't appear to make sense in our timeline.
4009880.name: Time Lost Liquid

4009881.desc: The blood of a Wild Kargo found deep in the Sleepywood Dungeon. It is highly desired by the local shamans for rituals of vitality.
4009881.name: Kargo Blood

4009882.desc: Noxious fumes emanate from this tiny little crystal. I better get this to Reuel before I pass out from the stench.
4009882.name: Crystalized Poison

4009883.desc: A small remnant of life left behind from a long time ago.
4009883.name: Life Force

4009884.desc: A charming little purple flower that grows deep within the clouds around Orbis.
4009884.name: Lilac

4009885.desc: Gathered from the top of the ocean. It is not known why it is found deep in the ocean.
4009885.name: Sea Foam

4009886.desc: The heart of a werewolf found deep within El Nath. Terrifying creatures, but their heart is said to contain an unusual magical property sought after by other alchemists.
4009886.name: Werewolf Heart

4009887.desc: Nobody really knows what kind of liquid this is.
4009887.name: Curious Liquid

4009888.desc: A rare golden peach harvested and kept by the Peach Monkeys.
4009888.name: Golden Peach

4009889.desc: A rare alligator skin with incredible durability.
4009889.name: Alligator Skin

4009900.desc: A gift for Chang'e, the Goddess of the Moon, containing a lot of fruit.
4009900.name: Fruit Gift

4009901.desc: A delicious mooncake for Chang'e, the Goddess of the Moon.
4009901.name: Mooncake

4009902.desc: A fragment that contains some of Ephenia's soul.
4009902.name: Ephenia's Soul Shard

4009903.name: Ellin Crystal
4009903.desc: A wondrous stone with a thousand facets. Who knows powers it contains?

4009904.desc: According to rumors, this golden medallion contains a part of Von Leon's soul.
4009904.name: Von Leon's Medallion

4009905.name: Von Leon's Parchment
4009905.desc: A parchment containing indecipherable ancient scriptures.

4009993.desc: Increases the amount of Experience gained by 20%
4009993.name: 1.2x Exp Coupon

4009994.desc: Increases the amount of Drops and Mesos gained by 20%
4009994.name: 1.2x Drop/Mesos Coupon

4009995.desc: Increases the amount of Experience, Drops, and Mesos gained by 10%
4009995.name: 1.1x Exp/Drop/Mesos Coupon

4009996.name: Bobby's Coupon
4009996.desc: A coupon Bobby Buzzcut gave me for helping him out, he said he'd change my look for me at anytime.

4009997.desc: Increases the amount of Experience, Drops, and Mesos gained by 20%
4009997.name: 1.2x Exp/Drop/Mesos Coupon

4009998.desc: Increases the amount of Experience, Drops, and Mesos gained by 50%
4009998.name: 1.5x Exp/Drop/Mesos Coupon

4009999.name: 2x Exp/Drop/Mesos Coupon
4009999.desc: Increases the amount of Experience, Drops, and Mesos gained by 100%

4020006.desc: The ore of a yellow jewel

4020007.desc: The ore of a jewel that's transparent

4020008.desc: An ore of a crystal that has dark powers stored in it

4020009.name: Piece of Time
4020009.desc: A raw ore of a gem that contains the power of time.

4021008.name: Black Crystal
4021008.desc: A very rare crystal with a dark power that lay asleep in it.

4021009.name: Star Rock
4021009.desc: A glittering jewel that possesses a mysterious power of a star.

4021010.name: Rock of Time
4021010.desc: A fascinating gem that contains the power of time.

4030000.name: Omok Piece : Slime
4030000.desc: A slime-shaped Omok piece to play Omok.

4030001.name: Omok Piece : Mushroom
4030001.desc: A mushroom-shaped Omok piece to play Omok.

4030009.name: Omok Table
4030009.desc: A wooden table that allows you to play Omok.

4030010.name: Omok Piece : Octopus
4030010.desc: An octopus-shaped Omok piece to play Omok.

4030011.name: Omok Piece : Pig
4030011.desc: A pig-shaped Omok piece to play Omok.

4030012.name: Monster Card
4030012.desc: The monster cards needed for the game of Match Cards. Need to have plenty of cards.

4030013.name: Omok Piece : Bloctopus

4030014.name: Omok Piece : Pink Teddy

4030015.name: Omok Piece : Panda Teddy

4030016.name: Omok Piece : Trixter
4030016.desc: A Trixter-shaped Omok piece to play Omok.

4030032.name: Rousseau's Key
4030032.desc: Rousseau dropped this mysterious key. You can probably free the imprisoned souls with it.

4030033.name: Freed Soul Crystal
4030033.desc: A soul crystal that was freed yet remains in this world.

4030034.name: Rose
4030034.desc: The legendary flower, said to capture the hearts of women all across centuries.

4030035.name: Rose Bouquet
4030035.desc: A bouquet made of only the finest roses. Smelling it sends your mind off into a land of romance.

4030036.name: Rose Seed
4030036.desc: A mysterious rose seed. The rose that grows from it must be lovely.

4031000.name: Maria's Letter
4031000.desc: A letter by Maria. Needs to be delivered to Lucas of Amherst.

4031001.name: Lucas' Letter
4031001.desc: A letter by Lucas. Needs to be sent to Mushroom Town's Maria.

4031002.name: Lucas's Gold Watch
4031002.desc: Lucas's gold watch made out of pure gold.

4031003.name: Sera's Mirror
4031003.desc: Sera's mirror. Has lots of decorations on it.

4031004.name: Sparkling Rock
4031004.desc: A sparking rock that shines by itself.

4031005.name: Arcon's Blood
4031005.desc: A bottle full of Arcon's blood

4031006.name: Weird Medicine
4031006.desc: No telling the power of this mysterious, weird medicine

4031007.name: Old Gold Watch
4031007.desc: An old gold watch. An article left by Alex's late mother.

4031008.name: Dances with Balrog's Letter
4031008.desc: A letter from 'Dances with Balrog' of Perion. Needs to be shown to the 'Warrior Job Instructor' at somewhere around the highland.

4031009.name: Grendel the Really Old's Letter
4031009.desc: A letter from Grendel the Really Old of Ellinia. Needs to be shown to the "Test Instructor For Magicians" at somewhere around the forrest.

4031010.name: Athena Pierce's Letter
4031010.desc: A letter from Athena Pierce of Henesys. Needs to be shown to the "Test Instructor For Bowmen" at somewhere around the Dungeon.

4031011.name: Dark Lord's Letter
4031011.desc: A letter from "Dark Lord" of Kerning City. Needs to be shown to the "Test Instructor For Thieves" at somewhere around the city.

4031012.name: The Proof of a Hero
4031012.desc: A proof from the instructor that you have passed the test for the 2nd job advancement. Once possessed, you'll be recognized as a hero.

4031013.name: Dark Marble
4031013.desc: A mysterious marble that possesses the dark, ugly nature of the monster.

4031014.name: Rina's Unagi Special
4031014.desc: A special Unagi consisting of the tails of Curse Eye...and pig's head. Needs to be delivered to Ronnie.

4031015.name: Fresh Milk
4031015.desc: A fresh milk from the fairies. Needs to be delivered to Ronnie.

4031016.name: Secret Book
4031016.desc: No one knows what's in this book.

4031017.name: Magic Box
4031017.desc: A box locked away with a powerful magical lock. Apparently there are jewels inside.

4031018.name: Treasure Scroll
4031018.desc: A map that shows where the jewels are hidden away.

4031019.name: Scroll of Secrets
4031019.desc: A mystical scroll written in a lost ancient language.

4031020.name: Pink Anthurium
4031020.desc: A pile of flowers that give off pink, mystical colors..

4031021.name: Orange Anthurium
4031021.desc: A pile of flowers that give off orange, mystical colors.

4031022.name: Blue Anthurium
4031022.desc: A pile of flowers that give off blue, mystical colors.

4031023.name: Yellow Anthurium
4031023.desc: A pile of flowers that give off yellow, mystical colors.

4031024.name: Purple Viola
4031024.desc: A purple flower with a huge flower bud.

4031025.name: Pink Viola
4031025.desc: A pink flower with a huge flower bud.

4031026.name: Blue Viola
4031026.desc: A blue flower with a huge flower bud.

4031027.desc: An orange flower with a huge flower bud.

4031028.name: White Viola
4031028.desc: A white flower with a huge flower bud.

4031029.desc: A single-rooted Ginseng that appears to be aged.

4031030.desc: A double-rooted Ginseng that appears to be aged.

4031031.name: Triple-Rooted Ginseng
4031031.desc: A triple-rooted Ginseng that appears to be aged.

4031034.desc: A scroll with unrecognizable ancient characters on it.

4031035.name: Bartos' Letter
4031035.desc: A letter from Bartos the instructor. Needs to be delivered to Frod.

4031036.name: Ticket to Construction Site B1
4031036.desc: The ticket that allows you to enter Construction Site B1 of Kerning City Subway.

4031037.name: Ticket to Construction Site B2
4031037.desc: The ticket that allows you to enter Construction Site B2 of Kerning City Subway.

4031038.name: Ticket to Construction Site B3
4031038.desc: The ticket that allows you to enter Construction Site B3 of Kerning City Subway.

4031040.name: Shumi's Roll of Cash
4031040.desc: The roll of cash that Shumi lost.

4031041.name: Shumi's Sack of Cash
4031041.desc: The sack of money that Shumi lost.

4031042.name: Black Feather
4031042.desc: A feather burning in black. So light, it feels like it's going to fly away.

4031043.name: Red Cape
4031043.desc: A red cape for women-only. Looks like it's going to be very warm.

4031044.name: Ticket to Orbis (Basic)
4031044.desc: A basic ticket needed to get on the ship that heads to Orbis Station of Ossyria Continent.

4031045.name: Ticket to Orbis (Regular)
4031045.desc: A regular ticket needed to get on the ship that heads to Orbis Station of Ossyria Continent.

4031046.name: Ticket to Ellinia (Basic)
4031046.desc: A basic ticket needed to get on the ship that heads to Ellinia of Victoria Island.

4031047.name: Ticket to Ellinia (Regular)
4031047.desc: A regular ticket needed to get on the ship that heads to Ellinia of Victoria Island.

4031048.name: Blank Scroll
4031048.desc: A scroll written in unrecognizable letters. Get this to Chef of Lith Harbor to trade with a prize.

4031049.name: A Piece of an Ancient Scroll
4031049.desc: An old piece of paper that seems to be part of an ancient document.

4031050.name: Cracked Black Crystal
4031050.desc: A black crystal that seems like the one Spiruna lost. It's broken, probably by the monsters stepping on it.

4031051.name: Fairy Dust
4031051.desc: A collection of dust from the fairies flapping their wings. It has a mysterious light to it.

4031052.name: Hella's Pendant
4031052.desc: A pendant Hella has been keeping since childhood. Needs to deliver this to Jade.

4031053.name: Old Ring
4031053.desc: An old ring found from a tomb in the deep valley of snowfield. Maybe Alcaster may have seen this before...

4031054.name: Old Piece of Map
4031054.desc: An old piece of paper that seems to be a part of an ancient map.

4031055.name: Memory Powder
4031055.desc: A very fine powder that's hard to feel. Has the power to return the memory of a person.

4031056.name: The Book of Ancient
4031056.desc: A book that contains incredible spells that are banned. A regular person can't even open the book; it's that powerful...

4031057.name: The Necklace of Strength
4031057.desc: A necklace earned by deservingly defeating the "other self" at the Other Dimension with power.

4031058.name: The Necklace of Wisdom
4031058.desc: A necklace earned by convincingly answering all the questions at the Holy Land with poise and full of wisdom.

4031059.name: Black Charm
4031059.desc: A charm earned by defeating the "other self" at the world of new dimension.

4031060.name: Nick's Ring
4031060.desc: The ring of Nick, the long-lost son of Scadur.

4031061.name: Piece of Fire Ore
4031061.desc: A piece of an ore that has the power of fire in it. Used as a material to make the sacrifice for the Zakum altar.

4031062.name: The Breath of Lava
4031062.desc: Contains the scorching heat of the lava needed to refine a sacrifice.

4031063.name: Torr's Horn
4031063.desc: A little horn that Torr lost.

4031064.name: Orange Marble
4031064.desc: Orange marble that Boss kitty has stolen from Sakura.

4031065.name: Excellent Luck Fortune Cookie Message
4031065.desc: Fortune cookie message, which tells you excellent luck

4031066.name: Great Luck Fortune Cookie Message
4031066.desc: Fortune cookie message, which tells you great luck

4031067.name: Good Luck Fortune Message
4031067.desc: Fortune cookie message, which tells you good luck

4031068.name: Ordinary Luck Fortune Cookie Message
4031068.desc: Fortune cookie message, which tells you ordinary luck

4031069.name: Bad Luck Fortune Cookie Message
4031069.desc: Fortune cookie message, which tells you bad luck

4031070.name: Terrible Luck Fortune Cookie Message
4031070.desc: Fortune cookie message, which tells you terrible luck

4031071.name: Worst Luck Fortune Cookie Message
4031071.desc: Fortune cookie message, which tells you worst luck

4031072.name: A Key of the Magic Box
4031072.desc: An item, which enables you to open the magic box. You should bring this to Geanie.

4031073.name: Ticket to Ludibrium (Basic)
4031073.desc: A basic ticket to Ludibrium in Ossyria

4031074.name: Ticket to Ludibrium (Regular)
4031074.desc: A regular ticket to Ludibrium in Ossyria

4031075.name: New Year's Card from Blackbull
4031075.desc: A New Year's Card from Blackbull of Perion. This needs to be delivered to Grendel the Really Old of Ellinia.

4031076.name: New Year's Card from Grendel the Really Old
4031076.desc: A New Year's Card from Grendel the Really Old of Ellinia. This needs to be delivered to Helena of Henesys.

4031077.name: New Year's Card from Helena
4031077.desc: A New Year's Card from Helena of Henesys. This needs to be delivered to Dark Lord of Kerning City.

4031078.name: Manager Karl's Camera
4031078.desc: A camera borrowed from Manager Karl. This is used to take pictures of the 10 workers at Eos Tower.

4031079.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 1
4031079.desc: A picture of a roly-poly at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Need to look for 9 more.

4031080.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 2
4031080.desc: 2 pictures of roly-poly workers at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Need to look for 8 more.

4031081.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 3
4031081.desc: 3 pictures of roly-poly workers at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Need to look for 7 more.

4031082.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 4
4031082.desc: 4 pictures of roly-poly workers at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Need to look for 6 more.

4031083.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 5
4031083.desc: 5 pictures of roly-poly workers at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Need to look for 5 more.

4031084.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 6
4031084.desc: 6 pictures of roly-poly workers at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Need to look for 4 more.

4031085.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 7
4031085.desc: 7 pictures of roly-poly workers at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Need to look for 3 more.

4031086.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 8
4031086.desc: 8 pictures of roly-poly workers at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Need to look for 2 more.

4031087.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 9
4031087.desc: 9 pictures of roly-poly workers at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Need to look for 1 more.

4031088.name: Photo of Roly-Poly 10
4031088.desc: 10 pictures of roly-poly workers at Eos Tower through Manager Karl's camera. Now I got them all!

4031089.name: Screwdriver
4031089.desc: A screwdriver that Roly-Poly 6 lost. Used to tighten screws.

4031090.name: Piece of Memory
4031090.desc: Korin's pieces of lost memory earned through defeating the aliens.

4031091.name: Korin's Memory
4031091.desc: Korin's pieces of lost memory put together in one.

4031092.name: Mechanical Parts
4031092.desc: Parts lost in the toy factory. Have to gather up 10 of them and get them to Cheng the assistant.

4031093.name: Tasty Walnut
4031093.desc: You can definitely smell this from afar. Very much stuffed inside, which would be perfect for Delv the Toy Soldier.

4031094.name: Pendulum
4031094.desc: An important part of the clock for the Ludibrium Clocktower. Need to get this to Mark the Toy Soldier.

4031095.name: Box of Parts #1
4031095.desc: A box of robotic parts 1 that Dr. Kim of Omega Sector requested.

4031096.name: Box of Parts #2
4031096.desc: A box of robotic parts 2 that Dr. Kim of Omega Sector requested.

4031097.name: Box of Parts #3
4031097.desc: A box of robotic parts 3 that Dr. Kim of Omega Sector requested.

4031098.name: All-purpose Clock Spring
4031098.desc: A spring that is needed to make the grandpa clock run.

4031099.name: Sealed Letter
4031099.desc: Appears to be a very old letter from the outer space. Sealed in an old, raggedy envelope with the candle wax used as a stamp.

4031100.name: Blueprint Machine
4031100.desc: A machine with the robot's blueprint on it. Can't look at it unless you know how to run it.

4031101.name: Laser Gun
4031101.desc: A laser gun used by Hoony to defeat the aliens.

4031102.name: Note
4031102.desc: A note full of descriptions on the history of the Grays and their past actions.

4031103.name: Barnard Gray's Cell
4031103.desc: The DNA of an alien. It may contain lots of informatin regarding them.

4031104.name: Zeta Gray's Cell
4031104.desc: The DNA of an alien. It may contain lots of informatin regarding them.

4031105.name: Ultra Gray's Cell
4031105.desc: The DNA of an alien. It may contain lots of informatin regarding them.

4031106.name: Chief Gray's Cell
4031106.desc: The DNA of an alien. It may contain lots of informatin regarding them.

4031107.name: Dogon's Report
4031107.desc: A report that contains valuable information regarding the hidden headquarters of an alien follower.

4031108.name: Super Alarm Clock
4031108.desc: An alarm clock with many functions that'll surely wake up the Pink Mesoranger.

4031109.name: White Chocolate
4031109.desc: An ingredient used to make a chocolate. Melt it, mix it with water, then mold it accordingly to make a delicious-looking chocolate.

4031110.name: Dark Chocolate
4031110.desc: An ingredient used to make a chocolate. Melt it, mix it with water, then mold it accordingly to make a delicious-looking chocolate.

4031111.name: Heart Box
4031111.desc: A heart-shaped box with no decoration whatsoever. Used to carry the chocolate.

4031113.name: Basket
4031113.desc: A basket with a handle. Decorate it with ribbons and chocolate, and this may come out as something nice.

4031114.name: Cover Material
4031114.desc: All the materials used to decorate the chocolate basket are in here. It looks like ribbons, marbles, and fabrics in it.

4031115.name: Special Battery
4031115.desc: A special battery used to move Master Robo.

4031116.name: Secret Document
4031116.desc: A secret document that contains classified information on the Omega Sector. A security device is attached to it.

4031117.name: Meteorite Sample
4031117.desc: A sample of the meteorite that was recently discovered at the Coolan Field.

4031118.name: Deciphered Memory Card
4031118.desc: Rombot's memory card that Porter deciphered.

4031119.name: Black Toy Heena
4031119.desc: A black Toy Heena; no way to find out how it originally looked like.

4031122.name: Sugar
4031122.desc: Used to make candies. Melt it to turn it into syrup, then sprinkle them onto the fruits to make tasty fruit candies.

4031123.name: Pineapple
4031123.desc: Cut in triangles. Used to make tasty fruit candies.

4031124.name: Strawberry
4031124.desc: A very ripe, red strawberry. Used to make tasty fruit candies.

4031125.name: Wooden Skewer
4031125.desc: A long wooden skewer for the fruits.

4031126.name: Porter's Letter
4031126.desc: A letter from Porter of the Omega Sector. I need to deliver this to Kay the Engineer, who should be at the Omega Sector Silo, on time.

4031127.name: Pilot's Letter
4031127.desc: A letter recovered from a broken transport in what appears to be written by a missing pilot. Need to get this to Kay the Engineer, who should be at the Omega Sector Silo.

4031128.name: Weaver's Letter
4031128.desc: A letter from Weaver the assistant. Need to get this to Nerr.

4031129.name: Savory Cheese
4031129.desc: As soft as it gets. I can make a soup out of this.

4031130.name: Maintenance Manual
4031130.desc: A maintenance manual with the blueprint of the machine at the Toy Factory. Mac the Mechanic had originally lost it.

4031131.name: Blue Carp
4031131.desc: A blue koynobori used on children's day.

4031132.name: Red Carp
4031132.desc: A red koynobori used on children's day.

4031133.name: Green Baby Carp
4031133.desc: A green koynobori used on children's day.

4031134.name: VIP Ticket to Florina Beach
4031134.desc: It is needed to go to Florina Beach. If in possession of the ticket, you can simply head to Florina Beach for free FOR LIFE.

4031135.name: Dull Crystal
4031135.desc: A crystal without the sparkling light, because its powers have been used up while inside the body of the Drum Bunny.

4031136.name: Gray's Document
4031136.desc: A document of a Gray in what appears to be an alien writing. Hard to decipher.

4031137.name: Box of Presents
4031137.desc: A box of presents for the kids on children's day.

4031138.name: Money Sack
4031138.desc: A money sack for the kids on children's day.

4031140.name: Dull Crystal
4031140.desc: A crystal without the sparkling light, because its powers have been used up while inside the body of the Drum Bunny.

4031141.name: Parts #1
4031141.desc: A box full of robotic parts no. 1 that Dr. Kim of Omega Sector lost.

4031142.name: Parts #2
4031142.desc: A box full of robotic parts no. 2 that Dr. Kim of Omega Sector lost.

4031143.name: Parts #3
4031143.desc: A box full of robotic parts no. 3 that Dr. Kim of Omega Sector lost.

4031144.name: Hero's Gladius
4031144.desc: A fully reawaken Gladius that a hero has used.

4031145.name: Pendulum
4031145.desc: An important part of the clock for the Ludibrium Clocktower. Need to get this to Mark the Toy Soldier.

4031146.name: Animal Fossil
4031146.desc: A fossil of an animal from thousands of years ago.

4031147.name: Plant Fossil
4031147.desc: A fossil of a leaf of a plant from thousands and thousands of years ago.

4031148.name: Winston's Recommendation
4031148.desc: A letter of recommendation from Winston the Archeologist. Need to deliver this to Dr. Betty of Ellinia.

4031149.name: Fossil Box
4031149.desc: A wooden box that contains fossils. On the cover reads 'WARNING: Handle with CARE.'

4031150.name: Plant Sample
4031150.desc: A plant that's been dug out and kept with everything in tact,

4031151.name: Stuffed Drake Skull
4031151.desc: Drake Skull kept in its original state through chemicals.

4031152.name: Fossil Report
4031152.desc: Dr. Betty's final report on the studies of fossils.

4031153.name: Stump's Teardrop
4031153.desc: Very rarely found on Dark Axe Stump's. A hardened liquid from Stump.

4031154.name: Estelle's Special Sauce
4031154.desc: A special sauce from Estelle of Ellinia. Its ingredients and formulas are all kept secret.

4031155.name: Broken Mirror Glass
4031155.desc: A piece of a shattered mirror.

4031156.name: Sparkling Glass Marble
4031156.desc: A huge glass marble that is transparent and radiates in multiple colors. At the corner of it says "To My Friend Utah."

4031157.name: Maple History Book I
4031157.desc: An important history book that contains everything about the history of MapleStory.

4031158.name: Maple History Book II
4031158.desc: Part II of the Maple History Books trilogy contains mostly of the growth of Maple. This book is also an important reference for the future of MapleStory.

4031159.name: Maple History Book III
4031159.desc: Part III of the Maple History Books trilogy contains the history behind the emergence of evil monsters in the MapleStory.

4031160.name: Medal of Honor
4031160.desc: Got all 3 Maple History Books and gave it to Tigun. According to him, this is a medal personally awarded by the King of Ludibrium.

4031161.name: Rusty Screw
4031161.desc: A rusty screw from an old, unusable box that has been broken down. Can this be recycled?

4031162.name: Old Wooden Board
4031162.desc: An old wooden board from an old, unusable box that has been broken down. Can this be recycled?

4031163.name: Flying Medicine
4031163.desc: A fairy medicine made with a collection of rare, hard-to-find ingredients. There's a legend that anyone that takes pill can fly, but it's only been passed around from generations to generations.

4031164.name: Alligator Skin Pouch
4031164.desc: A pouch made out of alligator skin. Looks sturdy enough to hold on to most anything.

4031165.name: Witchgrass Leaf
4031165.desc: Leaves of the Witchgrass growing in the swamps. Laiden with incredible magical powers, it is used as a primary source for herbal medicine.

4031166.name: Olaf's Recommendation
4031166.desc: A letter of recommendation written by Olaf the job agent.

4031167.name: Blue Present Box for Training
4031167.desc: A blue present box that the GM hung on the monster for the event "Face the Hotness."

4031168.name: Yellow Present Box for Training
4031168.desc: A yellow present box that the GM hung on the monster for the event "Face the Hotness."

4031169.name: Green Present Box for Training
4031169.desc: A green present box that the GM hung on the monster for the event "Face the Hotness."

4031170.name: Tachion
4031170.desc: A particle that is the source of power for the time sphere; it is used to trigger the force in relations to time.

4031171.name: Mysterious Powder
4031171.desc: A mysterious powder that glows in gold.

4031172.name: Ludibrium Medal
4031172.desc: A medal earned from the gatekeepeer, and is apparently needed to enter a certain door. The word Ludibrium is engraved at the center of this gold medal.

4031173.name: Ayan's Letter
4031173.desc: A letter from Ayan. Must be delievered to Bruce of Henesys.

4031174.name: Ayan's Toy Sword
4031174.desc: A toy sword that Ayan played with growing up.

4031175.name: Tachion
4031175.desc: A particle that is the source of power for the time sphere; a new bundle of energy can be formed through this.

4031176.name: Piece of Cracked Dimension A
4031176.desc: This must be what Flo mentioned as "a piece of cracked dimension."

4031177.name: Piece of Cracked Dimension B
4031177.desc: This must be what Flo mentioned as "a piece of cracked dimension."

4031178.name: Piece of Cracked Dimension C
4031178.desc: This must be what Flo mentioned as "a piece of cracked dimension."

4031179.name: Piece of Cracked Dimension
4031179.desc: A piece of the cracked dimension that Papulatus used to enter this world. Use this piece to seal up the cracks of dimension.

4031180.name: Beginner's Shopping Guide
4031180.desc: A Shopping guide for beginners that Yoona asked to bring for the quiz.

4031181.name: Rice Powder
4031181.desc: A sack of well-grinded rice powder. Add this with honey and leaf for something delicious!

4031182.name: Honey
4031182.desc: A beehive full of sweet honey.

4031183.name: Leaf
4031183.desc: A strong-scented leaf. Put this in when making the Song Pyun for optimal results

4031184.name: Glutinous Rice Powder
4031184.desc: A sack of well-grinded Glutinous Rice Powder. Add this with honey and oil for nice Yugwa.

4031185.name: Pot of Honey
4031185.desc: A pot full of sweet honey

4031186.name: Bottle of Oil
4031186.desc: A bottle full of sesami oil.

4031187.name: Gold Song Pyun
4031187.desc: How about a nice Gold Song Pyun for the elderly, like Chief Stan of Victoria?

4031188.name: Han Gwa Set
4031188.desc: How about a nice Han Gwa Set for the elderly, like Manager Karl of Ludibrium?

4031189.name: Aurora Marble
4031189.desc: It's an aurora marble from Buffy. Unlike other marbles, this one seems to emit a special force.

4031190.name: Horn Flute
4031190.desc: A horn flute that emits a soothing sound that spreads all over the area. It is decorated with a feather and has a leather handle on it.

4031191.name: Golden Bell
4031191.desc: A small gold bell that is needed to make a new necklace for Nero.\nUsed as a : Quest Item

4031192.name: Red Ribbon
4031192.desc: A red ribbon needed to make a new necklace for Nero.\nUsed as a : Quest Item

4031193.name: Soul Collector
4031193.desc: Ghosthunter Bob uses this to collect souls. There must be something incredible inside, since it has DANGER written on it.

4031194.name: Nella's Korean Costume
4031194.desc: A Korean costume Nella will wear for Korean Thanksgiving.

4031195.name: Aurora Marble
4031195.desc: An aurora marble that was held by Buffy. Probably the one that Mason mentioned before.

4031196.name: Dark Tachion
4031196.desc: Tachion, the source of power for the time sphere, is emitting a force of evil. Destroy this by throwing it in the lava at the deepest part of El Nath.

4031197.name: Tears of Kelvelos
4031197.desc: A bottle that contains the tears of a legendary monster, Kelvelos

4031198.name: Empty Potion Bottle
4031198.desc: An empty bottle that used to contain spell ingredients.

4031199.name: Lunar Wristband
4031199.desc: A wristband made of Lunar Pixie Moonpiece and Star Pixie Starpiece.

4031200.name: Sap of Nependeath
4031200.desc: A squeezed-out sap of Nependeath and Dark Nependeath seeds.

4031201.name: Sweet Syrup
4031201.desc: A sugar-sweet syrup made by Estelle of Ellinia.

4031202.name: Nependeath Juice
4031202.desc: A nutritious, tasty juice made by Elma the Housekeeper.

4031203.name: Halloween Candies
4031203.desc: Halloween candies acquired from the monsters.

4031204.name: Lisa's Recommendation
4031204.desc: A recommendation letter by Lisa. Needs to be delivered to Scadur of El Nath for approval.

4031205.name: Lisa's Special Medicine
4031205.desc: A special medicine made by Lisa. Very sweet-scented, it drives up the appetite of everyone near it.

4031206.name: Ripped Travel Ticket 1
4031206.desc: An unknown travel ticket ripped in half.

4031207.name: Ripped Travel Ticket 2
4031207.desc: The other half of a ripped traveling ticket.

4031209.name: SOS Letter
4031209.desc: A letter requesting rescue inside a glass bottle. Since the bottle contains dry sand, it looks like someone is lost in the middle of an island where there is full of sand.

4031210.name: Robinson's ID
4031210.desc: The pilot Robinson's ID. Name : Robinson Team : Transport - Pilot ID number : XXX-XXXXX

4031211.name: Lama's Sign
4031211.desc: A piece of paper that has Lama's Sign on.

4031212.name: Cold Steam
4031212.desc: A cold steam from the mouth of Cold Eye.

4031213.name: Wild Kargo's Spirit Rock
4031213.desc: A purple rock which contains a sealed-up soul of Wild Kargo.

4031214.name: Tauromacis's Spirit Rock
4031214.desc: A green rock which contains a sealed-up soul of Tauromacis.

4031215.name: Taurospear's Spirit Rock
4031215.desc: A blue rock which contains a sealed-up soul of Taurospear.

4031216.name: Jr. Balrog's Spirit Rock
4031216.desc: A dark rock which contains a sealed-up soul of Jr. Balrog.

4031217.name: Golden Key
4031217.desc: A golden key, which emits a mysterious white light.

4031218.name: The Contract of Darkness
4031218.desc: The source of power for all zombies. A contract written on a raggedy old paper, it details the contract with the dark force as well as the dates.

4031219.name: Scadur's Bow
4031219.desc: Icadur made this bow for his brother Scadur. Light, solid, and very powerful.

4031220.name: Mythical Flour
4031220.desc: A mythical flour that Ace of Hearts uses to make cookies.

4031221.name: Omega Sector Warp Capsule
4031221.desc: A warp capsule only available for the members of the Omega Sector. Unlike other warp capsules, this one allows one to teleport directly to the Omega Sector, regardless of which island or continent the person is on.

4031222.name: Steel Hoe
4031222.desc: A rock-solid hoe that is used for farming. Since the blade is made out of steel, it should last a while.

4031223.name: Box of Jewelry
4031223.desc: A box full of expensive jewelry and other treasures that emerged from Hongbu's gourd.

4031224.name: Warrant of Attachment
4031224.desc: A warrant of attachment that emerged from Nolbu's gourd; \nAll of Nolbu's possessions will be seized and auctioned off by OO/OO/OO.

4031225.name: Magic Seed
4031225.desc: A small, white seed that Swallow brought from across the river. Plant it somewhere safe, and it'll grow.

4031226.name: Gwin's Bag
4031226.desc: A heavy bag that is full of mysterious items. Looking into the corner of the back of the bag, the name GWIN is written on it.

4031227.name: Centipede Red Marble
4031227.desc: A red marble previously possessed by the Centipede. A weird vibe can be felt on it.

4031231.name: Artemisia
4031231.desc: This plant can be seen everywhere around spring time.

4031232.name: Goblin Cap
4031232.desc: A black cap worn by the Goblin when pulling pranks on someone. Legend has it that when this cap is worn, the person will become invisible.

4031233.name: Goblin Bat
4031233.desc: A wooden bat with lots of horns attached to its surface. Goblins carry these around all the time. Legend has it that this bat will make all the wishes come true.

4031234.name: Goblin Cape
4031234.desc: A cape made out of tiger skin. Very furry and warm, legend has it that anyone that dons this cape will become courageous.

4031235.name: Storybook on Hongbu and Nolbu
4031235.desc: The storybook that features a Korean Folk Tale on Hongbu and Nolbu.

4031236.name: Storybook on Kong Ji and Pat Ji
4031236.desc: The storybook that features a Korean Folk Tale on Kong Ji and Pat Ji.

4031237.name: Storybook on Brotherly Love
4031237.desc: The storybook that features the Korean Folk Tale 'Brothery Love'.

4031238.name: Storybook on the Goblin Story
4031238.desc: The storybook that features the Korean Folk Tale 'The Goblin Story'.

4031239.name: The Letter to Camila
4031239.desc: A letter to Camila from a pen pal far far away.

4031240.name: Camila's Reply
4031240.desc: A letter Camila wrote for her pen pal far far away, Kong Jwi.

4031241.name: Swallow's Lost Seed
4031241.desc: A seed that Swallow, who is very prone to losing things, lost in the middle of the mountain.

4031242.name: Dolphin Taxi Coupon
4031242.desc: This coupon allows the owner to use the Dolphin Taxi available in Aquarium. Ride the taxi all the way to the Sharp Unknown.

4031243.name: Ripped Travel Ticket 1

4031754.desc: A form of concentrated energy, harvested from the alternate dimension of Versal. The dark energy denotes a chaotic element.
