4031755.desc: An ancient totem that pulses with mystic energy.

4031756.name: Mystic Astrolabe
4031756.desc: A golden instrument used for navigation.  Said to have magical effects when combined with other items.

4031757.name: Antellion Relic
4031757.desc: An old world tablet with strange markings. These are said to combine with other objects.

4031758.name: Naricain Jewel
4031758.desc: A lost jewel created by Naricain, the demon sorceror. Said to add tremendous dark power to crafted items.

4031759.name: Subani Ankh
4031759.desc: One of Subani's Ankhs. Said to have protective powers and ward off darkness.

4031760.name: White Versal Materia
4031760.desc: A form of concentrated energy, harvested from the alternate dimension of Versal. The blinding white energy indicates it is still unstable.

4031761.name: Materia Orb
4031761.desc: Materia from Versal that has been stabilized into an orb form.  It still pulses with energy.

4031764.name: Paranormal Activity Report Page
4031764.desc: A page from a file detailing strange activity and possible locations for ghosts.  It doesn't look very professional.

4031765.name: Blank Paranormal Subject Questionnaire
4031765.desc: This is an official MBI form that is intended for gathering data on paranormal subjects.  It is currently blank.

4031766.name: Completed Paranormal Subject Questionnaire
4031766.desc: This official MBI form has been completed by a paranormal subject.  Hmmm... very interesting information.

4031767.name: Sophilia's First Doll
4031767.desc: A worn, happy looking doll that has seen better days.

4031768.name: "Perfect" Sophilia Doll
4031768.desc: A doll that is a chilling likeness of Sophilia but looks odd and unnatural.

4031769.name: Tarrymore Earring
4031769.desc: This beautiful, elegant earring belongs to Ludmilla.

4031770.name: Sepha Earring
4031770.desc: This expensive, stylish earring belongs to Ludmilla.

4031771.name: Omni Key
4031771.desc: A strange key kept in excellent condition. Can be used to enter fireplaces in the Prendergast Mansion.

4031772.name: Toy Workshop Key
4031772.desc: Jonas' key to his Toy Workshop at the top of the Prendergast Mansion.

4031773.name: Dry Branch
4031773.desc: An arid branch so devoid of water, it looks like even the slightest touch might break it.

4031774.name: Yulete's Lab Report
4031774.desc: A compilation of Yulete's lab work and research. Very neat!

4031775.name: Frankenroid's Blueprint
4031775.desc: A blueprint of Frankenroid created by Yulete.

4031776.name: Sirin's Pattern
4031776.desc: The pattern of the clothes Sirin designed. Comes with a detailed step-by-step guide for beginners.

4031777.name: Juliet's Present
4031777.desc: Juliet made this for Romeo. What kind of guy would enjoy this as a gift?

4031778.name: Romeo's Love Letter
4031778.desc: A letter Romeo wrote to profess his love for Juliet.

4031779.name: Juliet's Lunch Box
4031779.desc: A lunch box Juliet made for Romeo. I am not sure if the food inside is completely edible...I'll let Romeo try it instead.

4031780.name: Mysterious Red Liquid
4031780.desc: A red liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031781.name: Mysterious Green Liquid
4031781.desc: A green liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031782.name: Mysterious Yellow Liquid
4031782.desc: A yellow liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031783.name: Mysterious Blue Liquid
4031783.desc: A blue liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031784.name: Mysterious Purple Liquid
4031784.desc: A purple liquid Yulete made for the combination of reagents.

4031785.name: Lunchbox Recipe
4031785.desc: A lunch box recipe sold by Han the Broker. The author's name is on the cover - H. No way it's written by Han the Broker...

4031788.name: Red Marble
4031788.desc: A glowing Red Marble Master Goblin prepared for Do Gong. Apparently it helps mastering spells.

4031789.name: Antidote Marble
4031789.desc: An antidote to King Sage Cat's poison.

4031790.name: Small Clue
4031790.desc: A cloth from a robe found from Tri-Tailed Foxes. This may explain Chil Nam's bizarre behavior.

4031791.name: Ice Crystal
4031791.desc: A piece of ice with mysterious powers that may recover the Statue of the Spirit of Snow.

4031792.name: Mushroom Candy
4031792.desc: A sweet candy that resembles a mushroom.

4031793.name: Old Fox's Tail
4031793.desc: One of the tails from the Old Fox. Very soft and shiny.

4031794.name: Tae Soo's Peach
4031794.desc: A special Peach Tae Soo plucked out of the Peach Farm with Tae Sang's blessings. Only the sweetest and the most delicious Peaches can be found here.

4031795.name: Cat Doll Under a Spell
4031795.desc: A cat doll from Sage Cat with a spell from Do Gong.

4031796.name: Yulete's Lab Report
4031796.desc: A compilation of Yulete's lab work and research. The notes, while very neat, are complicated.

4031797.name: Yulete's Report
4031797.desc: A report full of notes from Yulete's various expriments.

4031798.name: Finished Reagent
4031798.desc: A reagent made with a combination of liquids.

4031799.name: Romeo's Snow Rose
4031799.desc: A snow rose from Romeo to Juliet.

4031800.name: Maria's Letter
4031800.desc: A letter from Maria to Lucas, the chief of Amherst.

4031801.name: Lucas's Recommendation Letter
4031801.desc: A recommendation letter from Lucas for a beginner.

4031802.name: Jr. Sentinel Shellpiece
4031802.desc: A hard shellpiece that's a part of Jr. Sentinel.

4031803.name: An Empty Beer Mug
4031803.desc: A mug that has no beer in it.

4031805.name: Bob's Snail Shell
4031805.desc: Threatened for his life, Bob went back into his shell. You can carry him. He's not too heavy..

4031806.name: Romeo's Engagement Ring
4031806.desc: A beautiful set of silver rings that Romeo got for Juliet for the engagement, with help from Allegro.

4031811.name: Sophilia's First Doll
4031811.desc: A worn, happy looking doll that has seen better days.

4031812.name: Paranormal Activity Report Page
4031812.desc: A page from a file detailing strange activity and possible locations for ghosts.  It doesn't look very professional.

4031815.name: Heartstopper
4031815.desc: Just one taste of this spicy candy and it'll feel like your heart's on fire!

4031816.name: Pumpkin Taffy
4031816.desc: Sweetened pumpkin taffy on a candy cane stick.

4031817.name: Red Gummy Slime
4031817.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good.

4031818.name: Green Gummy Slime
4031818.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good.

4031819.name: Purple Gummy Slime
4031819.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good.

4031820.name: Orange Gummy Slime
4031820.desc: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored.  If only real Slimes tasted this good.

4031822.name: Infinity Circlet Forging Manual
4031822.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating an Infinity Circlet.

4031823.name: Antellion Miter Forging Manual
4031823.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating an Antellion Miter.

4031824.name: Stormcaster Gloves Forging Manual
4031824.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating Stormcaster Gloves.

4031825.name: Crystal Leaf Earrings Forging Manual
4031825.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating Crystal Leaf Earrings.

4031826.name: Zeta Cape Forging Manual
4031826.desc: Professor Foxwit's blueprint for creating a Zeta Cape.

4031827.name: Sirius Cloak Forging Manual
4031827.desc: Professor Foxwit's blueprint for creating a Sirius Cloak.

4031828.name: Dark Shard Earrings Forging Manual
4031828.desc: Professor Foxwit's blueprint for creating Dark Shard Earrings.

4031829.name: Black Phoenix Shield Forging Manual
4031829.desc: Professor Foxwit's blueprint for creating a Black Phoenix Shield.

4031830.name: Ghost Sack
4031830.desc: A strange sack that contains ghosts. If I mistakenly open this, I feel like a million ghosts might try and possess me.

4031831.name: Mirror Piece
4031831.desc: A piece of a mirror. If I have this with me, I'll be able to see ghosts with my own eyes.

4031833.name: Pumpkin Juice
4031833.desc: A juice made with pumpkin. It is very fragrant.

4031834.name: Perfect Tool
4031834.desc: The most perfect tool for making dolls.

4031835.desc: The earrings that Lyudmilla lost. They shine with brilliance.

4031836.name: Score
4031836.desc: The score that Lyudmilla asked for. No one knows what kind of music is in it.

4031837.name: Dumped Doll
4031837.desc: A doll that Sophelia used to cherish a long time ago. She threw it away when she got a new doll.

4031838.name: Piece of Cloth
4031838.desc: A small piece of cloth. If you drag and drop it onto the rag doll, the doll will be completed bit by bit.

4031839.name: Crumpled Letter
4031839.desc: An old, crumpled letter. It is extremely damaged and therefore not very legible.

4031840.name: Old Orgel
4031840.desc: A beautiful, yet old orgel that shows the traces of time. Written on the inside of the orgel are the words, "For Dear Miss Helena".

4031841.name: Magic Flask (Empty)
4031841.desc: An empty bottle that can be filled with magic.

4031842.name: Magic Flask (Filled)
4031842.desc: The Vigor of the Sea fills this magic flask.

4031844.name: Rolonay's Research Report
4031844.desc: A report document compiled by Rolonay in response to Dr. Kim's research request.

4031845.name: Daily Log
4031845.desc: Bart's log report of various happenings nearby, as seen from the watchtower.

4031846.name: Black Magician's Token
4031846.desc: A token of proof that one is a follower of the Black Magician.

4031848.name: Milk Jug (1/3)
4031848.desc: A jug filled with 1/3rd of milk. Exact measurements.

4031849.name: Milk Jug (2/3)
4031849.desc: A jug filled with 2/3rds of milk.  Exact measurements.

4031850.name: Milk Jug (Full)
4031850.desc: A jug filled to the brim with milk. Don't spill it!

4031851.name: Whalean Canned Food
4031851.desc: Kenta's special, canned delicacy of cooked sea horse tail, beloved by Whales.

4031852.name: Dress
4031852.desc: A fancy, fashionable dress made by Madame Ming Ming herself.  The inscription says "Kyrin".

4031853.name: Abel's Glasses
4031853.desc: Abel's lost pair of glasses. Black, horn-rimmed and polished.

4031854.name: Miscellaneous Glasses
4031854.desc: Someone's lost pair of glasses. To whom do they belong?

4031855.name: Miscellaneous Glasses
4031855.desc: Someone's lost pair of glasses. To whom do they belong?

4031856.name: Potent Power Crystal
4031856.desc: A Power Crystal that contains concentrated monster power.

4031857.name: Potent Wind Crystal
4031857.desc: A Wind Crystal that contains concentrated dexterity extract, drained from evasive monsters.  Enables agility.

4031859.name: Recommendation Letter for 4th Job Advancement
4031859.desc: A recommendation letter written by the Chiefs in El Nath to  the Priest of Minar Forest.

4031860.name: Heroic Pentagon
4031860.desc: A pentagon-shaped badge proving one's status as a hero.

4031861.name: Heroic Star
4031861.desc: A star-shaped pendant proving one's status as a hero.

4031862.name: Black Magician's Token
4031862.desc: A token of proof that one is a follower of the Black Magician.

4031863.name: Confidential Report
4031863.desc: A highly confidential report compiled by Baine. Keep it a secret!

4031864.name: Allowance
4031864.desc: Money from Mom and Dad. Can be used to purchase a Nexon Game Card.

4031865.name: Nexon Game Card - 100 points
4031865.desc: A Nexon Game Card worth 100 points. Will be redeemed into Maple Points!

4031866.name: Nexon Game Card - 250 points
4031866.desc: A Nexon Game Card worth 250 points. Will be redeemed into Maple Points!

4031867.name: A secret letter
4031867.desc: A secret letter that contains information about the traitorous MV.  Needs to be delivered to Charles the Adventurer.

4031868.name: Spirit Jewel
4031868.desc: A fossilized jewel which contains the pure essence of a monster in crystallized form. It gives off a potent aura of evil.

4031869.name: Papulatus' Key
4031869.desc: A mysterious key held by Papulatus. Wonder where the key might fit?

4031870.name: Papulatus' Key
4031870.desc: A mysterious key that enables separation from different dimensions. What did Papulatus use this key for?

4031871.name: Sturdy Leather
4031871.desc: Sturdy leather belonging to a Blue Dragon Turtle.

4031872.name: Heart of Stone
4031872.desc: A heart made of stone that can fill the Red Dragon Turtle's heart with cruelty.

4031874.desc: A token of proof that one is a member of the Vikings. The Gigantic Spirit Vikings take this token with them wherever they go.

4031875.name: Nevermelting Snow
4031875.desc: A batch of snow that stays powdery. It never melts for some reason.

4031876.name: Flyers
4031876.desc: A flyer that contains some important message from Rooney on it.

4031877.name: Little Suzy's Wishlist
4031877.desc: Little Suzy's Wishlist. Neatly written in pencil. Must be taken to Maple Claws or O-Pongo.

4031878.name: Star of Maplemas Spirit

4031879.name: Orb of Versalmas Cheer
4031879.desc: The spirit of Versalmas, the holiday celebrating the 99 days of sunshine in Versal.

4031880.name: Stock Certificate for Grubber Industries
4031880.desc: A stock certificate good for one share in Mr. Grubber's company.  It may be worth a lot of money someday!

4031881.name: Picture of Torr
4031881.desc: Someone took a picture of Torr flying in the night sky of Happyville. Torr seems happy in this picture.

4031882.name: Chimney Broom
4031882.desc: This will enable you to sweep inside the Chimney eventhough it is long and wide.

4031883.name: Flashlight
4031883.desc: This will enable you to light up the dark chimney.

4031884.name: Warm Milk
4031884.desc: This warm milk will help Icarus to go to bed.

4031885.name: Mapler Recommendation
4031885.desc: Recommendation written by Happyville people. Item cannot be dropped.

4031886.name: Completed Socks
4031886.desc: Happyville Trend Socks made with skill from Mrs. Santa Claus. Item cannot be dropped.

4031887.name: Tamed Rudolph
4031887.desc: A lost Rudolph that has been tamed through spells.

4031890.desc: A special card needed to travel to the Command Center in Omega Sector.  Can only be used inside the Nautilus' Warp Machine.

4031891.name: Gold Pouch
4031891.desc: A cloth pouch full of gold.

4031892.name: Tattered Map
4031892.desc: An old, tattered map from hundreds of years ago.

4031893.name: Byron's Recommendation Letter

4031895.name: Piece of Cheese
4031895.desc: A tasty piece of cheese, the main dish for mice.

4031896.name: Magic Reagent
4031896.desc: Pour it on the horoscope paper, and the future can be seen right then and there.

4031897.name: Ancient Helm

4031898.name: Ancient Armor
4031898.desc: An ancient, broken version of the Bosshunter Armor that has lost its original power.  With a magic ritual and the right spell components, this can be restored to its original, equippable condition.

4031899.name: Ancient Greaves
4031899.desc: An ancient, broken version of the Bosshunter Greaves that has lost its original power.  With a magic ritual and the right spell components, this can be restored to its original, equippable condition.

4031900.desc: A handy guide and how-to book for all things arcane.  No need to hire a professional magician, Ridley shows you how to do it yourself!

4031903.name: Jack O'Lantern

4031907.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a Tiger's Fang.

4031908.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a Neva.

4031911.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a pair of Facestompers.

4031912.name: Crystal Ilbi Forging Manual
4031912.desc: John Barricade's hastily drawn notes for creating a Crystal Ilbi.

4031915.desc: A jewel from the former headpiece worn by the dark sorceress LeFay.

4031916.desc: The remnant of an ancient king's burial garb, probably found from a Nihalian tomb.

4031917.desc: A shard from a legendary crystal sword shattered when used to slay a powerful demon.

4031918.desc: An ancient, broken version of the Bosshunter Faceguard that has lost its original power.  With a magic ritual and the right spell components, this can be restored to its original, equippable condition.

4031928.desc: A wave translator invented by Dr. Kim of Omega Sector to translate supersonic waves Grays use to communicate to one another. May be subject to malfunction.

4031988.desc: Item Agent O asked me to retrieve.  I should take it back to Agent O.

4031992.desc: This little worm lives in Ludirium. It's so small it's not at all threatening.

4031993.desc: A savory juice that Bartos really likes to drink.

4031999.desc: Directions believed be written by Master M.

4032004.name: Crimson Wood

4032009.name: Nightshadow Badge
4032009.desc: An emblem that marks one as a member of the Nightshadows.

4032013.name: Bigfoot's Toe
4032013.desc: The big toe of Bigfoot.  Even though it has a pretty ribbon tied around it, it still looks kinda gross.

4032014.name: Jack's Letter to John

4032015.name: Tao of Shadows

4032016.name: Tao of Sight
4032016.desc: A ancient Shadowknight artifact.  Its use is known only to the Raven Ninjas.

4032017.name: Tao of Harmony
4032017.desc: A ancient Shadowknight artifact.  Its use is known only to the Raven Ninjas.

4032021.name: Triferium Fuel Cell

4032022.name: Diferium Fuel Cell
4032022.desc: A futuristic power unit suitable for powering everything from toasters to toy robot dogs.

4032023.name: Sparkplug
4032023.desc: A useful component for many electronic devices, especially cybernetic protectors.

4032024.name: Jumper Cable
4032024.desc: A pair of jumper cables.  Anyone need a start?

4032025.name: T-1 Socket Adapter
4032025.desc: Looks like a socket adapter for the T-1 line of robotic devices.

4032026.name: Ridley's Stone
4032026.desc: An ancient magical stone bearing the mark of Ridley, the master artisan-magician.  It hums when in vicinity of a Ridley's Statue.

4032027.name: Coat Hanger
4032027.desc: A wire coat hanger that can be bent into different shapes, for function or for fun.

4032028.name: Wad of Gum
4032028.desc: A wad of gum that has been slightly chewed.  Still sticky!

4032029.name: Duct Tape
4032029.desc: A roll of silver duct tape.  Never know when this may come in handy!

4032030.name: Stretchy Material
4032030.desc: A piece of highly stretchy, elastic cloth.

4032031.name: Lucky Charm
4032031.desc: A small silver lucky charm.  Hopefully, it'll bring you more luck than it did the leprechaun.

4032033.name: Entrance pass for tomato farm 1
4032033.desc: It's a pass for the strange tomato farm. Talk to Ben to enter the inside of tomato farm.

4032034.name: Entrance pass for tomato farm 2
4032034.desc: It's a pass for the strange tomato farm. Talk to Ben to enter the inside of tomato farm.

4032035.name: A Lost Snipe
4032035.desc: A Snipe that has lost her way. Take her and move up to a high point, where she can use the launch pad-like area to try to fly her way back home.

4032036.name: Special Ticket to the Moon
4032036.desc: As long as you have this with you, the Moon Bunny will give you the Sweet Rice Cake 5 times a day.

4032037.name: Beef Slice
4032037.desc: A single slice of beef. Marinate it, then grill it to try to make the Fire Grill Skewer.

4032038.name: Dry Mushroom
4032038.desc: A single slice of dried mushroom. Mix it with some seasoning to make a Fire Grill Skewer.

4032039.name: Whole Bellflower
4032039.desc: A whole bellflower that can be used as part of the Fire Grill Skewer if soaked in salt water

4032040.name: Fire Grill Skewer Dish
4032040.desc: Simply a Fire Grill Skewer placed on a pretty dish. Nothing says Thank You quite like a nice dish of Fire Grill Skewer.

4032041.name: Moon Flower
4032041.desc: A beautiful flower that apparently only grows on the moon. Constantly glitters, thanks to all that moonlight it's been soaking up.

4032042.name: 1st Moon Photo Piece
4032042.desc: The first piece of photo of the moon. Collect the other two, and it'll turn into a photo of a beautiful full moon. Place the pictures inside the envelope to make sure they don't rip.

4032043.name: 2nd Moon Photo Piece
4032043.desc: The second piece of photo of the moon. Collect the other two, and it'll turn into a photo of a beautiful full moon. Place the pictures inside the envelope to make sure they don't rip.

4032044.name: 3rd Moon Photo Piece
4032044.desc: The third piece of photo of the moon. Collect the other two, and it'll turn into a photo of a beautiful full moon. Place the pictures inside the envelope to make sure they don't rip.

4032055.name: Event Ticket (Regular)
4032055.desc: A ticket that's required to enter the Mini Dungeon during the event period. Without this, you won't be able to fully participate in the event.

4032056.name: Magic Crystal
4032056.desc: A beautiful crystal with a red maple leaf inside. Hand this in to the Event Personnel, and she'll exchange this with a prize.

4032057.name: Attendance Sheet
4032057.desc: An attendance sheet that checks your daily attendance to MapleStory.

4032058.name: PB & J Sandwich
4032058.desc: A scrumptious Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich. The staple of lunch for all ages!

4032059.name: Chocolate Milk
4032059.desc: Rich Happyville chocolate combined with high-quality milk straight from the fields of Henesys. A delicious treat!

4032060.name: Chips
4032060.desc: An irresistible snack. Way too tasty to eat just one!

4032061.name: Cookie
4032061.desc: A chocolate chip cookie found in the wild, now prepared to eat. Guaranteed to bring a smile to someone's face.

4032062.name: Fruit Roll Up
4032062.desc: A favorite in Victoria Island, this delectable snack bursts with the taste of strawberries.

4032063.name: Notebook
4032063.desc: A special notebook used for the 2008 Back to School Event. Can be turned into the Maple Admin. May the best server team win!

4032066.name: Baby Bird Feather
4032066.desc: A soft feather presumably from a baby bird. Gaga will definitely like this.

4032084.name: Sophilia's Perfect Doll

4032085.name: Peto Doll
4032085.desc: A doll that has the ability to transform into Peto.

4032086.name: Mysterious Small Egg

4032087.name: Lucky White Monkey Doll
4032087.desc: A white monkey doll that is considered a lucky charm. Whether it really brings good luck remains to be seen.

4032091.name: A Secret Note

4032095.desc: A magical vigor of snow that provides much-needed support to the snowman. Drop this item on the snowman and magical things may happen.

4032102.desc: The lost treasure that was stolen by the Master of Disguise who brazenly entered Ereve. Let's take it back to Oz.

4032187.desc: A medal acquired from the Christmas High Jump map.

4032233.desc: This can be used to create the Mind of Maple Necklace.

4032239.name: Piece of Mind of Maple

4032247.name: Richard's Letter

4032248.name: Map to MV's Lair
4032248.desc: A map showing the way to MV's lair.

4032250.name: Mysterious Piece of Paper
4032250.desc: A piece of paper filled with mysterious scribbles. It looks like an item lost by Mu Young, Manji's apprentice. Take it to Mu Young.

4032262.desc: A letter that Mu Young asked you to deliver to Manji, his teacher. You must deliver it to Manji in Perion.

4032268.name: Drape

4032270.name: Glistening Sunlight

4161050.desc: A book that describes the different types of dragons and their characteristics. It appears that there is a first volume as well. \nDouble-click to open the book

4161051.desc: A Voyage Log written by a Crew Member. It's said to contain information about dragons... \nYou can open the book by double-clicking it.

4161052.desc: A guide for Evan. \nYou can open the book by double-clicking on it.

4161053.desc: A guide that has the information on how to obtain the 7th Anniversary Puzzle Pieces. Read this book and you can be a Puzzle King too!

4161079.name: Mercedes Guide
4161079.desc: A guide for Mercedes. \nDouble-click to open it.

4161080.name: Aria's Diary
4161080.desc: Part of a diary written by Aria. It's full of personal things, but has been damaged to the point that there are only few sections that you can actually read.\nDouble-click on the item to open the book.

4161081.name: Mesoranger Action Guide
4161081.desc: You, too, can become a Mesoranger! A guide that helps anyones with becoming a Mesoranger.

4162000.name: 7th Anniversary Diary
4162000.desc: A diary in which you can read all about the 7th Anniversary event. You can also see how close you are to earning a Joyous 7th Medal and your progress on the Rising Star mission. \nDouble-click to read.

4162001.name: Chivalry Log
4162001.desc: A book which can be used to check event paricipation status.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your participation, as well as rewards.

4162002.name: Tasty Watermelon Farming Journal
4162002.desc: A farming journal in which you can check the number days spent cultivating Tasty Watermelons.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your progress.

4162003.name: Secret Heat-Beating Recipe
4162003.desc: A secret recipe book in which you can check your progress in Special Fruit Sundae crafting.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your participation status and rewards.

4162004.name: Pirate Treasure Map Book
4162004.desc: A collection of pirate treasure maps.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your participation status and rewards.

4162005.name: Monkey Doll Recovery Record
4162005.desc: A book which can be used to check how many Monkey Dolls you have recovered.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your recovery status and rewards.

4162006.name: Legendary Fruit Juice Book
4162006.desc: A secret guide to making legendary fruit juices. This is just what you need to become a Legendary Fruit Juice Master! You can also record your juice-making triumphs in here.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your current juice-making record.

4162007.name: Eco Mapleteer Strategy Journal
4162007.desc: A strategy journal that records all the activities of Eco Mapleteers. If you use the Going Green skill once a day, mark it down in this book.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your Eco Mapleteer activity record.

4162008.name: Monster Mop-Up Journal
4162008.desc: A monster mop-up journal from the Administrator. You can receive a stamp in it once a day by defeating 200 monsters.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your monster mop-up record and rewards.

4162009.name: Memory Journal
4162009.desc: Record your memories from Legends, and make them last forever! By receiving and completing a Making Memories event once a day, your memories will be automatically recorded. Double-click to check.

4162010.name: Mini Maple Tree Cultivation Journal
4162010.desc: A journal for recording your progress in cultivating the Mini Maple Tree.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your progress.

4162011.name: Christmas Tree Journal
4162011.desc: A journal for recording your progress in growing your very own Christmas Tree. Click on it to open it.

4162012.name: Legends Awards Application
4162012.desc: An application you received from Gaga. Open it up to view a list of events you can partake in for awards.

4162013.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Score Card
4162013.desc: A score card for recording your wins and losses from playing Gaga.

4162014.name: Training Journal
4162014.desc: A training journal that records up to 10 days.

4220137.name: Mimiana Egg
4220137.desc: An egg of Mimiana, the Mount for knights. Watch the egg grow into a full-grown Mimiana by sharing your experiences with it. Once it matures into a full-grown creature, take it to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

4220138.name: Glass Incubator
4220138.desc: A glass incubator where Mimiana is stored. Drag the food into the incubator to feed Mimiana. Once it matures, take it back to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

4220139.name: Mimiana Egg
4220139.desc: An egg of Mimiana, the Mount for knights. Watch the egg grow into a full-grown Mimiana by sharing your experiences with it. Once it matures into a full-grown creature, take it to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

4220145.name: Mimiana Egg
4220145.desc: An egg of Mimiana, the Mount for knights. Watch the egg grow into a full-grown Mimiana by sharing your experiences with it. Once it matures into a full-grown creature, take it to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

4220146.name: Mimiana Egg
4220146.desc: An egg of Mimiana, the Mount for knights. Watch the egg grow into a full-grown Mimiana by sharing your experiences with it. Once it matures into a full-grown creature, take it to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

4220147.name: Mind of Maple Necklace
4220147.desc: A Mind of Maple Necklace that brings luck and hope to anyone who wears it.

4220148.name: Portrait of an Orange Mushroom
4220148.desc: Drawing paper on which you can draw a portrait of an Orange Mushroom. The portrait of an Orange Mushroom can be completed by using the Amazing, Mystical, or Magical watercolor paint on it. \r\nCan be opened by double-clicking on it with the mouse.

4220149.name: Portrait of an Octopus
4220149.desc: Drawing paper on which you can draw a portrait of an Octopus. The portrait of an Octupus can be completed by using the Amazing, Mystical, or Magical watercolor paint on it. \r\nCan be opened by double-clicking on it with the mouse.

4220150.name: Portrait of a Yeti
4220150.desc: Drawing paper on which you can draw a portrait of a Yeti. The portrait of a Yeti can be completed by using the Amazing, Mystical, or Magical watercolor paint on it. \r\nCan be opened by double-clicking on it with the mouse.

4220151.name: Hanging Scroll
4220151.desc: A Hanging Scroll given to you by the Black Wing Shadow Warrior. The erased content can be restored by using special ink.\r\nCan be opened by double-clicking on it with a mouse.

4220152.name: Rainbow Drawing
4220152.desc: A sheet of sketch paper that has a rainbow drawing. \r\nYou can open it with your mouse by double-clicking.

4220153.name: Dirty Treasure Map
4220153.desc: A treasure map given by Kyrin. There are three sections--red, green, and white--that are invisible. The green section should be cleaned first. \r\n\r\n*If you don't need the item anymore, just go to Jack in the Top Floor - Hallway to discard it.#

4220175.name: 7th Anniversary Jigsaw Puzzle
4220175.desc: The 7th Anniversary Jigsaw Puzzle. Complete the puzzle to see a picture of a birthday party.

4280000.name: Gold Box
4280000.desc: A gold treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Gold Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

4280001.name: Silver Box
4280001.desc: A silver treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Silver Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

4280002.name: Premium Gold Box
4280002.desc: A gold treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Premium Gold Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Premium Gold Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

4280003.name: Premium Silver Box
4280003.desc: A silver treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Premium Silver Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Premium Silver Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

4290000.name: Golden Chicken Effect
4290000.desc: Golden Chicken Effect was given as a reward for helping Lazy Daisy. You can turn it ON/OFF by double-clicking the icon or using the key configuration menu to assign a shortcut key.

4290001.name: Bummer Effect
4290001.desc: This effect is for people who helped Lazy Daisy but failed to hatch the egg. You can turn it ON/OFF by double-clicking the icon or using the key configuration menu to assign a shortcut key.

4300000.name: New Year's Card (Send)
4300000.desc: A beautiful card with season's greetings.

4301000.name: New Year's Card (Receive)
4301000.desc: A beautiful card with season's greetings. Double click on it to read!

4310000.desc: A coin released to mark the 10th Maple Anniversary. Only used during the 10th Anniversary, this can be used to purchase special items.
4310000.name: 10th Anniversary Coin
